title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Fish in Lapwai   1 Photos  Fish in Lapwai          Flora and Fauna   21 Photos  The flora and fauna of Nez Perce National Historical Park is as diverse as the park. With sites that stretch across four states (Idaho, Montana, Oregon, and Washington), the plants and animals found here reflect the regions they are from.          Nez Perce Tipi   4 Photos  On June 16, 2005 a 150-year-old buffalo hide tipi in the park's collection was photographed. The tipi was probably made in the 1850s and consists of sixteen to twenty buffalo hides, stitched together with sinew.            Nez Perce National Historical Park   11 Photos  A selection of some of the park's thirty-eight sites.
